iiv.io

Class NiftiHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • iiv.io.NiftiHeader

  • public class NiftiHeader
extends java.lang.Object
    Reads and stores an NIFTI header file information.
    Since:
    iiV1.0
    See Also:
    CNUAnalyzeImgFile

      Constructs an new instance of NiftiHeader reading info from filename.

      • NiftiHeader

        public NiftiHeader(java.lang.String filename)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Constructs an new instance of NiftiHeader reading info from filename.
        Parameters:
        filename - the file to read header information from
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if error reading from file

    • Method Detail

      • setFile

        public void setFile(java.lang.String filename)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Sets the filename adding the appropriate extension ".hdr" if not present.
        Parameters:
        filename - file name with or withoud ".hdr" extension
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • buildNiftiHdrFileNames

        public static java.lang.String[] buildNiftiHdrFileNames(java.lang.String filename)
        Builds a header file name (ie filename with .hdr extension). Maintains ".gz" extension after ".hdr" on compressed file names.
        Parameters:
        filename - to base header filename on
        Returns:
        filename with .hdr extension

        Returns:

      • get_space_to_meters_factor

        public double get_space_to_meters_factor()
        Gets the factor to convert the nifti location units into meters. Nifti resolution factors may be for meters, millimeters or micrometers.
        Returns:
        to meters factor

      • get_time_to_seconds_factor

        public double get_time_to_seconds_factor()
        Gets the factor to convert the nifti time units into seconds. Nifti resolution factors may be for seconds, milliseconds or microseconds.
        Returns:
        to seconds factor

      • getDimensions

        public CNUDimensions getDimensions()
        Outputs the Nifti dimensions as CNUDimensions.
        Returns:
        a copy of dimensions for this analyze file

      • getQFormCoordinateMap

        public NiftiQFormCoordinateMap getQFormCoordinateMap()
        Outputs the QForm coordinate map derived from the header.
        Returns:
        a copy of the QForm coordinate map or null if not applicable

      • getSFormCoordinateMap

        public NiftiSFormCoordinateMap getSFormCoordinateMap()
        Outputs the SForm coordinate map derived from the header.
        Returns:
        a copy of the SForm coordinate map or null if not applicable

      • getFactor

        public double getFactor()
        Gets the quantification factor for this nifti header. True voxel value = getFactor() * voxel_value + getTranslation();
        Returns:
        quantification factor

      • getTranslation

        public double getTranslation()
        Gets the quantification translation for this nifti header. True voxel value = getFactor() * voxel_value + getTranslation(); This is ignored for now.
        Returns:
        quantification translation value

        Returns:
        header information as a string
